message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase my product for $11,000. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. Can you meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $9,500 is a tempting offer, I believe this product will bring you even greater value. How about we meet in the middle at $10,500?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above that price. How about we meet at $9,800? I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not willing to go much higher.
